    public abstract class RhnXmlRpcCustomSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class of all XmlRpcSerializers. This exists because redstone.xmlrpc silently eats exceptions thrown by the specific Serializer instances, and we'd like to log that when it happens, so we can fix it.
